Package emissary.util

Class CharacterCounterSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,​V>
      • java.util.HashMap<String,​Integer>
        • emissary.util.CounterSet
          • emissary.util.CharacterCounterSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,​Integer>
    public class CharacterCounterSet
extends CounterSet
    A set of named counters for keeping counts on various classes of characters encountered
    See Also:

      • count

        public void count​(String s)
        Count the characters in s by class. This works by codepoint and handles codepoints beyond the BMP
        Parameters:
        s - the string to perform the count on
